featured.text: It was in the 19th century that the magician Robert Houdin came along and changed people’s views and attitudes about magic.
Today magicians try hard to find new ways to show their practiced skills.
The “Cups and Balls” trick which he was particularly good at is still performed by magicians all over the world today.
Other times, a magician may make you a magic charm, or say a spell, to cure you.

other.text: It was also because of Robert Houdin that many magicians were able to add Dr. or MD to their names.
What is the best title for the passage? (A) Magical Tricks (B) A Great Magician (C) Magic as Entertainment (D)
A magician named Dedi of Dedsnefu was reported to have performed for the pharaoh, or the king.

definition.en_def: A person who performs magic tricks and illusions.
definition.example: The magician amazed the audience with his incredible tricks.
